[ library(calendar) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

dwy_to_mjd(++DWY, ?MJD)

Convert a DayOfWeek/WeekOfYear/Year representation to MJD
DWY
structure of the form Day/Week/Year
MJD
Variable or integer

Description

Convert a DayOfWeek/WeekOfYear/Year representation to MJD, where DayOfWeek is the day number within the week (1 for monday up to 7 for sunday), and WeekOfYear is the week number within the year (starting with 1 for the week that contains January 1st)
